short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: It is used to import product from AliExpress to Akeneo PIM

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
What is AliExpress?
AliExpress is a B2C platform launched by Alibaba Group in 2010. It is a huge Chinese online retail service-based platform that offers products to international online consumers. It facilitates small businesses to sell products all over the world. 

What can we do this Extension?
AliExpress Akeneo connector allows you to import the products from AliExpress to Akeneo. With this extension, you are able to import product as well as product variants to Akeneo product database.

Who can use this extension?
Anyone can use this connector either developer or customer. Developer or customer can easily install the AliExpress Akeneo Extension for Google Chrome browser. For this, they have to find AliExpress Akeneo Importer Extension and add it to his/her chrome browser.

Purpose of this Chrome extension?
This connector allows you to import the product from AliExpress to Akeneo product database. Some features of this connector are:
1. Single click import button on product and categories page
2. Custom attributes will be created in Akeneo
3. Import product and product variants
4. Edit product details before import the products
